import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Xeno from '../Images/game.png'; import Pokedex from '../Images/Pokedex.png'; import SPAMStore from '../Images/SPAM-Store.png'; import Footer from './Footer'; import NavComponent from './NavComponent'; import Burger from '../Images/burger.png'; import FriendFinder from '../Images/friendfinder.png'; import WorkLife from '../Images/worklife.png'; import Title from './Title.js'; import ProjectsData from '../Data/ProjectsData'; const Projects = () => { let [title, projects] = useState(); title = ProjectsData.title; projects = ProjectsData.projects; return (
{projects.map((projects) => ( {projects.title} {projects.technology} {projects.description} Use It Here Github Repository ))} Pokedex ReactJS A front-end application that allows you to search for a Pokemon using the PokeAPI. Use It Here Github Repository Xenoplague Unity2D and C# A game that simulates the spread of a disease, created and presented as Mateo's Masters thesis. Use It Here Github Repository SPAM-Store MERN Stack This is a React boilerplate single page responsive portfolio app for store fronts. Github WorkLifeBalance MERN Stack Applicaiton that allows users to login and keep track of their hours spent. Use It Here Github FriendFinder ReactJS, Express Applicaiton that allows users pair themselves with their most likely match. Use It Here Github Bob's Burger Express, HandlebarsJS Application that lets you feed Bob's friend! Use It Here Github
); } export default Projects
